name: cleared
title: __Cleared Roles Menu__
description: Use the buttons below to obtain roles that required a specific `Cleared Role`.

fields.name: Name Color Button
fields.value: Use this button to add or remove a specific role that changes your name color in NAUR to one that matches the theme of a specific encounter

fields.name: Reclear Roles Button
fields.value: Use this button to add or remove specific mentionable Reclear Roles for a specific duty. These roles are used to ping people for Reclear parties.

fields.name: C4X Roles Button
fields.value: Use this button to add or remove specific mentionable C4X Roles for a specific duty. These roles are used to ping people for clear parties.
